definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: At appropriate places, he introduces the criticisms of the creationists and provides answers.
sentences.chinese: 在合適的地方他引進了對神創論的評判並提供解答。

sentences.english: For search engines, mainly Baidu and GG, respectively, please answer.
sentences.chinese: 針對搜索引擎，主要是百度和GG，請分別解答。

sentences.english: Contains settings to manage Remote Procedure Call troubleshooting .
sentences.chinese: 包含管理遠程過程調用疑難解答的設置。

sentences.english: Sets of hyperelastic analytical solution are presented with triangular function.
sentences.chinese: 用三角級數的形式給出了一組相應的超彈性解析解答。

sentences.english: Do you want to solve "Arkham's biggest mystery"?
sentences.chinese: 你想要解答“阿克漢姆最大的祕密”嗎？

sentences.english: By the time I was in high school, I really enjoyed solving interesting problems.
sentences.chinese: 當我上高中時，我已經喜歡上了解答有趣的問題。

sentences.english: Then the teacher gave us twenty minutes to think about it.
sentences.chinese: 然後，老師給我們二十分鐘來思考解答這個問題。

sentences.english: Closed questions can be answered in a few words or sentences.
sentences.chinese: 封閉式問題可以用三言兩語進行解答。

sentences.english: These taxing questions are too difficult for me to answer.
sentences.chinese: 思考題難度太大了，我不會解答。

sentences.english: Here are some suggestions for helping you answer that question.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有些建議，可以幫助你解答這一問題。

sentences.english: Sample midterm exams and answers are provided here.
I can answer all the questions except for the last one.
sentences.chinese: 除了最後一題外，所有標題問題我都可以解答。

sentences.english: I’ll look to one of my classroom experiences to answer this one.
sentences.chinese: 我將結合我的一項課堂教學實踐來解答這個問題。

sentences.english: Well above the five ways to answer a psychogenic insomnia how governance issues.
sentences.chinese: 以上五種方法很好地解答了心因性失眠怎樣治的問題。

sentences.english: Here are some questions and answers about the nuclear threat to Japan.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是一些關於日本地震後核泄漏威脅的問題和解答。

sentences.english: But you can find an answer in the next room.
sentences.chinese: 可是你只要看看這兒的小客廳，就得了解答。

definition: to answer questions (as teacher or consultant)/to clarify doubts
to dispel doubts/to clear up confusion
to dispel doubts/to clear up difficulties
